content: If you are the developer for FHIR IG that will be balloted in the January 2022 Ballot cycle, you must attend a webinar on November 3, 2021 from 1-2:30pm Eastern to review key dates and requirements for your IG to be approved to be included in the upcoming ballot cycle. You must register in advance for the meeting: https://hl7-org.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJApdu-vpzwuE9P8bn43pHE5FeJ2bwqpYhav. If you can not attend, please let me know and I will send you the recording. If you do not attend, your FHIR IG may not be approved for the January 2022 Ballot.
